verses.text: I waited patiently \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w He|strong="H1732"\w* turned \w to|strong="H1732"\w* me, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* heard \w my|strong="H1732"\w* cry.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* up \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* horrible pit, \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* miry clay. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* set \w my|strong="H8085"\w* feet \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* firm place \w to|strong="H3068"\w* stand.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H7272"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* new song \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mouth, \w even|strong="H5921"\w* praise \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God. Many \w shall|strong="H7272"\w* see \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H7272"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* trust, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* doesn’t \w respect|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* proud, \w nor|strong="H3372"\w* such \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w lies|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H3808"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wonderful works \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* thoughts \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w toward|strong="H6437"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w*’t \w be|strong="H3808"\w* declared \w back|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w*. \w If|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* declare \w and|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* counted.

\w Sacrifice|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* didn’t desire. \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* opened \w my|strong="H3068"\w* ears. \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* required \w burnt|strong="H6213"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w offering|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* said, “\w Behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H2654"\w* come. \w It|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5930"\w* written about \w me|strong="H7592"\w* \w in|strong="H2654"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* book \w in|strong="H2654"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* scroll.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* delight \w to|strong="H5921"\w* do \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5612"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God. \w Yes|strong="H2009"\w*, \w your|strong="H5921"\w* Torah \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* heart.”

\w I|strong="H8432"\w* \w have|strong="H2654"\w* proclaimed glad news \w of|strong="H8432"\w* righteousness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* assembly. Behold, \w I|strong="H8432"\w* \w will|strong="H7522"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* seal \w my|strong="H6213"\w* lips, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* know.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hidden \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* within \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*. \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w declared|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* salvation. \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* concealed \w your|strong="H3068"\w* loving kindness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*.

Don’t withhold \w your|strong="H3808"\w* tender \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w* \w from|strong="H3820"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* loving \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w truth|strong="H3808"\w* \w continually|strong="H3820"\w* preserve \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* innumerable evils \w have|strong="H3068"\w* surrounded \w me|strong="H4480"\w*. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* iniquities \w have|strong="H3068"\w* overtaken \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* able \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H3068"\w* \w up|strong="H3607"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* pleased, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H7200"\w*. Hurry \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* disappointed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded together \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek after \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w to|strong="H3068"\w* destroy \w it|strong="H3068"\w*. Let \w them|strong="H5337"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H3068"\w* backward \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* dishonor \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w delight|strong="H7521"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hurt.

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w them|strong="H3162"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* desolate \w by|strong="H7451"\w* reason \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* tell \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, “Aha! Aha!”

Let \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who seek \w you|strong="H5921"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H8074"\w* be glad \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. Let such \w as|strong="H5921"\w* love \w your|strong="H5921"\w* salvation say continually, “Let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* be exalted!”

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* poor \w and|strong="H3068"\w* needy. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* think \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H1245"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w help|strong="H8668"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* deliverer. Don’t delay, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
